bug.author: ryanjulian
bug.summary: setup_linux.sh fails while looking for mujoco 1.5.0 on a clean system
bug.description: This is probably related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ryanjulian/rllab/issues/89>ryanjulian/rllab#89</denchmark-link> , since dm_control uses mujoco 1.5.0. We may need to combine setup_mujoco.sh and setup_.sh Imported from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ryanjulian/rllab/issues/90>ryanjulian/rllab#90</denchmark-link>
